content.rendered:
Sometimes we just need to take a step back from all the morning runs and track day events, and have a bit of competitive fun on the gokart track. This is exactly what Lamborghini Club Indonesia did on the 14th of April. A friendly gokart competition was held for the members to see who could make their way around the track the quickest.   

To help keep the racing fairly competitive, the grand prize was a luxurious Dietrich OT-3 watch for the 1st place prize, along with vouchers reaching up to 5 million Rupiah for the 2nd and 3rd winners.   

A big congrats to the 3 winners of today! They deserved those prizes after battling it out through all the rounds.  The day was packed with a lot of laughs and competitive fun on the track.

Looking forward to the next event!
